chapters.title: Chapter 7:  Blacksmith's Puzzle
chapters.info:
Gerard Arganda,
      p. 218 (253–254)—Short, compact First Captain of
      Queen Alliandre's guards.
      He is a tough man; he worked his way up from
      the bottom to be where he is.  He dislikes Perrin,
      who he blames for taking his Queen where she could be kidnapped.
Chapter 8:  Whirlpools of Color
